data.fullContent: Abraham Hart was a nineteenth-century American publisher. He began work in the industry when he was still a boy. He formed a partnership with his colleague and formed the best-known publishing firm of the mid-1800s. When he retired from publishing, he got involved with industry and manufacturing.
data.answer: 亚伯拉罕·哈特是19世纪的美国出版商。他还是个孩子时就开始在这个行业工作了。他和同事合伙成立了19世纪中期最著名的出版公司。从出版业退休后，他开始涉足工业和制造业。
